author: mbk
msg: Revert r9600; it is redundant after r9599, which solves the problem better.

author: mbk
msg: Fix an OS X compile-time warning.
(get_root_changes_offset): Change datatype of num_bytes to apr_size_t.

author: jpieper
msg: In FSFS, make get_next_revision_ids close the current file so that it
can be moved on Win32.  Also fix a few other portability issues in
(hash_write): Pass an apr_size_t variable as the length to
(get_root_changes_offset): Use an apr_size_t variable as the

author: jpieper
msg: Add a new function in svn_io, svn_io_file_flush_to_disk, which flushes
all data written to a file to disk.  On Unix like systems, this
equates to fsync, for Win32, FlushFileBuffers is used.
(svn_io_file_flush_to_disk): New, flushes all data written to a file
(write_final_current): Flush the 'current' file to disk before
(svn_fs_fs__commit): Flush the new permanent rev-file to disk before
